answer:
Some vaccines are routinely recommended for all adults and that includes the Td booster every 10 years. Others may be recommended for you depending on your age, job, lifestyle, health conditions, travel plans and the vaccines you received in the past. Learn about the vaccines you need as an adult here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Which vaccines do you need boosters for as an adult? I went through the program as a kid and got everything I was supposed to - but aside from tetanus, am I supposed to update any?
question_variation_0: when do you need boosters for tetanus
question_variation_1: do you need booster vaccine for adult adult
